title: **-- 1 BED + HOME OFFICE -- 2 BATHS -- QUEEN BED FITS -- LUXURY BUILDI
posting_body: ['**-- 1 BED + HOME OFFICE -- 2 BATHS -- QUEEN BED FITS -- LUXURY BUILDING -- LAUNDRY ON SITE --**', 'Listing ID #: 212827', 'Price: $5,867', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 2.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Building Amenities', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Apartment Amenities', 'City View', 'Granite Kitchen', 'Hardwood', 'High Ceilings', 'Marble Bath', 'Open View', 'Renovated', 'This beautiful 1 bedroom + Home office boasts 2 bathrooms in the unit.', 'Easily convertible to a 2 Bed with space left for working from home!', '*11 ft ceilings *', 'Stainless steel appliances *Oak strip flooring', '*Stock photos used are of similar units in building **Broker fee applies', 'Building amenities include: 24/7 concierge Live-in super State of the art Fitness Center Resident lounge Furnished roof deck Laundry Valet services', 'Located in the heart of the Financial District, this building is within walking distance to the South Street Seaport, Brookfield Place, and all major subway lines (1,2,3,A,C,E,Path train)', 'Contact Anthony today to book an appointment!', 'Call/text @ 917 721 3315 or Email:', '<URL>', 'Anthony Bernard', 'Phone: (212) 402-7855', 'Mobile: 9177213315', 'Fax: (212) 402-7856', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 (212) 402-7855 \xa0 9177213315 \xa0 FAX (212) 402-7856 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Anthony Bernard at 9177213315']
